content.eamr: ( ing-2 "1 cup packed light brown sugar" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "350 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "175 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) In a large bowl, cream together the butter, butter flavored shortening, brown sugar, white sugar, eggs, and vanilla until smooth.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "cream"@20:25 / AC
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a large bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the butter"@35:45 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "butter flavored shortening"@47:73 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "brown sugar"@75:86 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "white sugar"@88:99 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "eggs"@101:105 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "vanilla"@111:118 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-1-0 "until smooth"@119:131 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Combine the flour, baking soda, cinnamon, cloves, and salt; stir into the sugar mixture.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Combine"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-6 "the flour"@11:20 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "baking soda"@22:33 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "cinnamon"@35:43 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "cloves"@45:51 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "salt"@57:61 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "stir"@63:67 / AC
		:ppt ( "the sugar mixture"@73:90 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Stir in the oats and raisins.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-11 "the oats"@11:19 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-12 "raisins"@24:31 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets.
5) Bake 10 to 12 minutes until light and golden.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:duration ( dur-5-0 "10 to 12 minutes"@8:24 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-5-0 "until light and golden"@25:47 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Let them cool for 2 minutes before removing from cookie sheets to cool completely.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "cool"@12:16 / AC
		:ppt ( "them"@7:11 / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-7-0 "2 minutes"@21:30 / DUR )
		:duration ( cond-7-0 "before removing from cookie sheets to cool completely"@31:84 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)
